description: The Full Size Mac Keyboard w/ 2 USB Ports  is a plug-n-play device.  Just connect the USB cable to your computer and you're ready to go; there is no syncing needed.  It also has two USB ports with easy access that are perfect for charging your iPod, connecting a mouse, or any other USB powered device.
title: iHome   Full Size Mac Keyboard with 2 USB Ports (IMAC-K121S)
